greeting: This is my little surprise for you.🙈
name: Patu😘
greetingText: They say the best things in life are free—so I guess that's why I got you for nothing.😜
wishText: Ours is a love story that began with a spark and grew into something so deep, so beautiful, and so unbreakable. From falling in love to making it official, every moment with you has been a blessing. You are not just my husband—you are my best friend, my greatest love, and my forever home.  ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday to the love of my life! ❤️
outroText: Hope you loved this, just like you're loving me!😜.
replayText: I'm sure you wanted see this again right? if so please click😜
